name: medical-reporting-platform
description: Enterprise-grade Medical Reporting Platform with Next.js 14 and Prisma

scripts.build:all: npm run build:libs && npm run build:web
scripts.build:sequential: npm run build:libs && npm run build:web
scripts.build:render: npm run build:libs && npx puppeteer browsers install chrome && cd apps/web && npx prisma generate && npm run build
scripts.clean: turbo run clean && rm -rf packages/lib/dist packages/ui/dist packages/lib/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo packages/ui/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo
scripts.db:push: cd apps/web && npx prisma db push
scripts.db:seed: cd apps/web && npx prisma db seed
